p: Data is the new-age currency in the fiercely market-driven economy of the twenty-first century. Data analysis using information technology has always been an attractive proposition, but in the modern era of social media and crowd-sourcing, artificial intelligence is fast replacing the conventional IT algorithms. In such a rapidly evolving global scenario, this article which uses case studies to bring to the fore, the lack of an the ethically sound "good governance" framework to guide international research collaborations, is very timely, relevant and welcome.
